amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funds for the administrative, operations, and management accounts in the Department of Housing and Urban Development to FY 2008 levels and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds available for administrative and operational expenses to FY 2008 levels and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 224 (Roll no. 420).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 224 (Roll no. 420).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Gosar.
